TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Validator extends System.Object
public ref class Validator abstract sealed

summary.span: 定义一个帮助器类，在与对象、属性和方法关联的 特性中包含此类时，可使用此类来验证这些项。

span.span: Defines a helper class that can be used to validate objects, properties, and methods when it is included in their associated attributes.

summary.span: 确定指定的对象是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the specified object is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryValidateObject (object instance, System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext validationContext, System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult> validationResults);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: instance
param.span: 要验证的对象。

param.name: validationContext
param.span: 用于描述要验证的对象的上下文。

span.span: The context that describes the object to validate.

param.name: validationResults
param.span: 用于包含每个失败的验证的集合。

span.span: A collection to hold each failed validation.

summary.span: 通过使用验证上下文和验证结果集合，确定指定的对象是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the specified object is valid using the validation context and validation results collection.

returns.span: 如果对象有效，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法计算每个附加到对象类型的实例。This method evaluates each instance that is attached to the object type. 它还将检查每个属性是否标记有提供。It also checks whether each property that is marked with is provided. 不是以递归方式验证对象的属性值。It does not recursively validate the property values of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryValidateObject (object instance, System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext validationContext, System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult> validationResults, bool validateAllProperties);

.method public static hidebysig bool TryValidateObject(object instance, class System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext validationContext, class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult> validationResults, bool validateAllProperties) cil managed

static member TryValidateObject : obj * System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext * System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult> * bool -> bool

param.name: instance
param.span: 要验证的对象。

param.name: validationContext
param.span: 用于描述要验证的对象的上下文。

span.span: The context that describes the object to validate.

param.name: validationResults
param.span: 用于包含每个失败的验证的集合。

span.span: A collection to hold each failed validation.

param.name: validateAllProperties
param.span: 若为 ，则验证所有属性。若为 ，则只需要验证所需的特性。

span.span: to validate all properties; if , only required attributes are validated..

summary.span: 通过使用验证上下文、验证结果集合和用于指定是否验证所有属性的值，确定指定的对象是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the specified object is valid using the validation context, validation results collection, and a value that specifies whether to validate all properties.

returns.span: 如果对象有效，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法计算每个附加到对象类型的实例。This method evaluates each instance that is attached to the object type. 它还将检查每个属性是否标记有提供。It also checks whether each property that is marked with is provided. 它验证该对象的属性值，如果`validateAllProperties`是`true`但不是以递归方式是否验证返回的属性的对象的属性。It validates the property values of the object if `validateAllProperties` is `true` but does not recursively validate properties of the objects returned by the properties.

span.span: A collection to hold each failed validation.

returns.span: 如果属性有效，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试每个与由标识的属性相关联的实例`validationContext`参数。This method tests each instance that is associated with the property that is identified by the `validationContext` parameter.

exception.span: 不能将 分配给该属性。

static member TryValidateValue : obj * System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext * System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult> * seq<System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute> -> bool

param.name: value
param.span: 要验证的值。

param.name: validationContext
param.span: 用于描述要验证的对象的上下文。

span.span: The context that describes the object to validate.

param.name: validationResults
param.span: 用于包含失败的验证的集合。

span.span: A collection to hold failed validations.

param.name: validationAttributes
param.span: 验证特性。

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示所指定值对所指定特性是否有效。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified value is valid with the specified attributes.

returns.span: 如果对象有效，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试中的每个验证特性`validationAttributes`参数与`value`参数。This method tests each validation attribute in the `validationAttributes` parameter against the `value` parameter. 如果`validationResults`参数不是`null`，此方法将添加对象为每个验证失败的验证结果集合。If the `validationResults` parameter is not `null`, this method adds a object for each validation failure to the validation results collection. 如果`validationResults`参数是`null`，此方法不会添加到集合的对象。If the `validationResults` parameter is `null`, this method does not add a object to the collection. 如果属性包含在`validationAttributes`参数，首先计算属性。If a attribute is included in the `validationAttributes` parameter, the attribute is evaluated first.

summary.span: 确定指定的对象是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the specified object is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试中的每个验证特性`validationAttributes`参数与`value`参数。This method tests each validation attribute in the `validationAttributes` parameter against the `value` parameter. 如果属性是包含在内，首先计算属性。If a attribute is included, the attribute is evaluated first.

exception.span: 参数不使用 参数进行验证。
